item.title: Decentralized Exchanges + We're moving to Discord!
item.description: div.OutlookMessageHeader, table.moz-email-headers-table, blockquote #_t, #MailContainerBody #_t {background-image:url(“https://click.mlsend.com/link/f/cnM9MTAyMjU3MzEwMjc0NTI2MTE1NiZjb2RlPWQwbDQmcj0xMjc5NTQ1MA==.4C7bftBRnOO7d0hB6BHr90ZiBkVNy1KlVnYdYMX3XQs")} Minnesota Cryptocurrency Events and News Join us this Friday to discuss decentralized exchanges. Normal exchanges provide a single point of failure, which has resulted in numerous hacks and general uncertainty.Â Decentralized exchanges on the other hand offer a solution as they allow users to retain control of their funds throughout the trading process.
